verses.name: John 4:50
verses.text: Jesus saith unto him, Go thy way; thy son liveth. And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him, and he went his way.

verses.name: John 4:51
verses.text: And as he was now going down, his servants met him, and told him, saying, Thy son liveth.

verses.name: John 4:52
verses.text: Then enquired he of them the hour when he began to amend. And they said unto him, Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him.

verses.name: John 4:53
verses.text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour, in the which Jesus said unto him, Thy son liveth: and himself believed, and his whole house.
